cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP_INSTREAMS to a negative value (-1) will cause configuration validation failure as stream counts must be positive integers.

du.explanation_en: Setting prach_msg1_FDM to 10 exceeds the valid range (0-3) for PRACH message 1 FDM configuration, causing RACH configuration errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 prach_msg1_FDM 設定為 10 超過有效範圍 (0-3)，會導致 RACH 配置錯誤。
